org.crosswire.jsword.book
类 Books

java.lang.Object
  org.crosswire.jsword.book.Books
所有已实现的接口：
BookList
public final class Books
extends java.lang.Object
implements BookList

The Books class (along with Book) is the central point of contact between the rest of the world and this set of packages.

作者：
Joe Walker [joe at eireneh dot com], DM Smith [dmsmith555 at yahoo dot com]
另请参见：
for license details.
The copyright to this program is held by it's authors.

getMaxLength

public int getMaxLength(java.lang.String propertyKey)
Get the maximum string length of a property

参数：
propertyKey - The desired property
返回：
-1 if there is no match, otherwise the maximum length.

getMaxLength

public int getMaxLength(java.lang.String propertyKey,
                        BookFilter filter)
Get the maximum string length of a property on a subset of books.

参数：
propertyKey - The desired property
filter - The filter
返回：
-1 if there is no match, otherwise the maximum length.

addBook

public void addBook(Book book)
Add a Book to the current list of Books. This method should only be called by BibleDrivers, it is not a method for general consumption.

removeBook

public void removeBook(Book book)
                throws BookException
Remove a Book from the current list of Books. This method should only be called by BibleDrivers, it is not a method for general consumption.

抛出：
BookException

registerDriver

public void registerDriver(BookDriver driver)
                    throws BookException
Register the driver, adding its books to the list. Any books that this driver used, but not any more are removed. This can be called repeatedly to re-register the driver.

参数：
driver - The BookDriver to add
抛出：
BookException

unregisterDriver

public void unregisterDriver(BookDriver driver)
                      throws BookException
Remove from the list of drivers

参数：
driver - The BookDriver to remove
抛出：
BookException

getDriversByClass

public BookDriver[] getDriversByClass(java.lang.Class<? extends BookDriver> type)
Since Books keeps a track of drivers itself, including creating them when registered it can be hard to get ahold of the current book driver. This method gives access to the registered instances.

getDrivers

public BookDriver[] getDrivers()
Get an array of all the known drivers

返回：
Found int or the default value

getWritableDrivers

public BookDriver[] getWritableDrivers()
Get an array of all the known drivers

返回：
Found int or the default value
